summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Private After Dark production upgrade. Successfully verified violet theme implementation, new anime-style character images, particle animations, referral system, and all required features working perfectly.
passed_tests: Backend API /api/ returns version 2.0.0 (production ready)
Backend API /api/health returns healthy with telegram_configured: true
Backend API /api/telegram/info returns correct bot link: https://t.me/MidnightDesireAi_bot
Backend API Stripe checkout creation working
Backend API Telegram webhook accepts POST requests
Frontend loads with deep violet color scheme (#6D28D9) - no red/pink colors detected
53 elements found with violet colors - theme upgrade successful
Particle animations visible and working (30 particles with particle-float animation)
New anime-style character images load successfully for all 3 characters:
- Valeria Voss image: /characters/valeria.jpg (anime style)
- Luna Mirelle image: /characters/luna.jpg (anime style)
- Nyx image: /characters/nyx.jpg (anime style)
Updated character taglines display correctly:
- Valeria: 'Classy. Controlled. Intensely selective.'
- Luna: 'Soft. Emotional. Deeply attached.'
- Nyx: 'Mysterious. Slow. Unpredictable.'
Referral section displays 'Invite Friends. Unlock More.' correctly
Referral CTA button 'Get Your Referral Link' working
Pricing cards with violet gradient highlights on Premium tier
Language switcher works perfectly (EN/FR/AR)
French language switch working - content changes to 'Trois fantasmes'
All buttons have violet gradient instead of red (btn-primary class)
All character chat buttons link to correct Telegram bot
All interactive elements clickable and functional
No error messages or broken functionality detected
Smooth transitions and parallax effects working
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (5/5 endpoints working), Frontend: 100% (all production upgrade features functional)
